snippet: Masahiro Tanaka flew back to New York to undergo an M.R.I. on his right elbow and was later placed on the disabled list with what the team described as elbow inflammation.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Masahiro Tanaka is placed on disabled list with what team describes as elbow inflammation; manager Joe Girardi says full determination of Tanaka's condition will come after team doctor Chris Ahmad reviews MRI results.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka flew back to New York to undergo an M.R.I. on his right elbow and was later placed on the disabled list with what the team described as elbow inflammation.

headline.seo: Masahiro Tanaka Goes on Disabled List After M.R.I. on Pitching Arm
headline.main: In Stormy Year, Yanks Lose Anchor as Tanaka Heads to D.L.
headline.print_headline: In Stormy Year, Yanks Lose Anchor
